name: Black Forest Trifle
author: BRENDAJST
summary: A trifle layered in a glass bowl that makes a beautiful display. Rich, yet light. Simple, yet still impressive and colorful.  I've made it several times for family holidays and it is always a hit!
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) package frozen pound cake, thawed and cut into cubes
1 (12 ounce) jar hot fudge ice cream topping, warmed
directions: Put about half of the pound cake cubes into the bottom of a glass trifle bowl; top with 1 can cherry pie filling, half of the hot fudge, and 2 cups whipped topping
Drizzle some of the hot fudge over the top layer of whipped topping
Dollop small amounts of the cherry pie filling decoratively over the whipped topping
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate at least 2 hours
